happenings.name: Astral Eclipse
happenings.description: Mana income is reduced by -30% and World Map Spells cost +50% Casting Points.

happenings.name: Blightfall Conjunction
happenings.description: Cities lose -5 Food per Population. Blightfall is active in combat: Each turn in combat a random unit takes 15 Blight damage and becomes inflicted with Diseased.

happenings.name: Colossus Moon
happenings.description: Regions around the world turn into Swamps. Thunder Storms is active in combat: Each turn in combat all units become Wet and 1 random unit takes 20 Shock damage.

happenings.name: Dawn Of The Lodestar (Order)
happenings.description: Celestial units and units with Faithful or Zeal gain Angelic Potential, granting: +2 Status Resistance and +20 Morale. Free Cities spawn armies to attack their targets. For the rest of the game, all units have -2 Spirit Resistance.

happenings.name: Eye Of Fire (Chaos)
happenings.description: Fiend and Demonkin units gain Demonic Potential, granting: Base attacks have a 30% chance to inflict a random negative status effect, this effect is doubled for non-repeating attacks. Free Cities lose -10 influence per turn and are able to declare war on their overlords when reaching Vassalage or lower. For the rest of the game, all units have -2 Fire Resistance.

happenings.name: Starry-eyed Enlightenment
happenings.description: Cities gain +100% Knowledge income. Declaring wars is always Unjust. Ending wars grants 200 Imperium.

happenings.name: Ravenous Visitants
happenings.description: Armies of hostile astral creatures appear across the world. Ethereal units gain Attunment: Enhancement, granting: Whenever a spell is cast, this unit gains a random positive status effect.

happenings.name: Melenis's Kiss
happenings.description: All units have a 30% chance of turning slain non-Undead units into Zombies under your control which stay after combat. These Zombies cannot regenerate Health.

happenings.name: Phase-shift Nixing
happenings.description: Teleporter province improvements, Teleportation spells, and Teleportation abilities are disabled. Phasing units cannot use teleporting abilities.

happenings.name: Rays Of Winter
happenings.description: Arctic terrain spreads around the world. Arctic Blizzards is active in combat: Every Turn in combat, all units take 8 Frost damage and all Wet units have a 90% chance of becoming Frozen. Units on Arctic provinces suffer from -5 Health regeneration per Turn and -2 Vision.

happenings.name: Sign of the Cleft Shield
happenings.description: Shield units gain Sign of the Cleft Shield, granting +40% damage and -4 Armor.

happenings.name: Sign Of The Huntress
happenings.description: Ranged, Battle Mage, and Support units gain Sign of the Huntress, granting: +30% damage and -1 Range.

happenings.name: Sign Of The Lumbering Staff
happenings.description: Battle Mage and Support units gain Sign of the Lumbering Staff, granting: +1 Range and Slow Movement in combat

happenings.name: Sign Of The Vanguard
happenings.description: Shock units gain Sign of the Vanguard, granting: Very Fast Movement in combat, Ranged attacks against this unit have -20% Accuracy, and -20% damage.

happenings.name: Cosmic Winds
happenings.description: Provinces turn into Deserts around the world. Blinding Sands is active in combat: Each turn in combat, each unit has a 60% chance of becoming Blinded for 1 Turn.

happenings.name: Invading Sylviculture
happenings.description: A World Tree seedling causes forests to spread into adjacent provinces. Grasping Vines is active in combat: Every 2 Turns in combat, all units have a 50% chance of becoming Immobilized for 1 Turn. Units on Forest provinces suffer from Living Forest, granting: -5 Health regeneration per Turn and -2 Vision.

happenings.name: Stirring Stone Conjunction
happenings.description: Cities gain +100% Production income. All units have Siege Breaker.

happenings.name: Sunstruck Eruptions
happenings.description: Provinces turn into Desolate around the world. Volcanic Eruptions is active in combat: Each turn in combat, 1-3 markers are placed. Then, after 1 Turn the ground will erupt and units within 1 range of the marker will suffer 10 Physical damage and 10 Fire damage. Random affected hexes will become On Fire.

happenings.name: Toll Of Seasons
happenings.description: Mysterious Fey folk appear from the mists to attack the cities of the unwary.

happenings.name: Drifting Ley Lines (Astral)
happenings.description: Magic Origin units gain Magic Origin Potential, granting: Attacks inflict Sundered Resistance and gain +5 Combat Casting Points at the start of combat. Combat spells are always Overcharged the first time they are cast each combat. For the rest of the game, all units have -2 Lightning Resistance.

happenings.name: Portent of Rousing
happenings.description: All units gain Portent of Rousing, granting: Unit Upkeep is reduced by 50%. Cities gain +100% Draft income. At the end of the happening, gain 20 Gold for each unit in your empire.
